query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name,
  c.slug,
  COUNT(pc.productId) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug
ORDER BY product_count DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name,
  c.slug,
  COUNT(pc.productId) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug
ORDER BY product_count DESC;
